Ri-li.original_name: Ri-li - Windows arcade/reflexion game with toy trains
Ri-li.name: Ri-li - Windows arcade/reflexion game with toy trains
Ri-li.original_desc: Ri-li is an arcade/reflexion game licensed under the GPL (General Public License). You drive a toy wooden train engine in many levels and you must collect all the coaches to win.
Ri-li.desc: Ri-li 是一款根據 GPL（通用公共許可證）授權的街機/反射遊戲。您在多個級別中駕駛玩具木製火車引擎，並且必須收集所有教練才能獲勝。

PlantsVsZombies.name: Plants vs Zombies
PlantsVsZombies.original_desc: Plants vs. Zombies belongs to the "tower defense" sub-genre of casual games, where the objective is to deploy a series of stationary weapons to protect a structure against hordes of enemies. Plants provide the artillery, and can be bought with sun power, the game's currency. The enemies are zombies invading a suburban lawn. At the start of each level, the player starts to plant the available seeds on the lawn in a strategic manner. Zombies slowly begin to appear from the street at the right side, just a few initially, and must be destroyed before they can reach the house on the other side. Sun power icons falls from the sky randomly, and must be collected with the mouse to increase the funds. The sunflower can be planted to generate extra units of sun power, but doesn't have any attack power against the invading undead. Besides their cost, the seed packs take some time to recharge after being used.
PlantsVsZombies.desc: 植物大戰殭屍屬於休閒遊戲的“塔防”子類型，其目標是部署一系列固定武器來保護建築物免受成群敵人的攻擊。植物提供火砲，可以用遊戲貨幣太陽能購買。敵人是入侵郊區草坪的殭屍。在每個關卡開始時，玩家開始有策略地在草坪上種植可用的種子。殭屍慢慢地開始從右側的街道上出現，最初只有少數，必須在它們到達另一邊的房子之前將其消滅。太陽能量圖標隨機從天而降，必須用鼠標收集以增加資金。種植向日葵可以產生額外的太陽能量，但對入侵的亡靈沒有任何攻擊力。除了成本之外，種子包在使用後還需要一些時間來充電。
